name: Wedding Ceremony
short_description: A wedding is a celebration or ceremony of marriage.
description: A wedding is a celebration or ceremony of marriage. Besides being a formal way to mark the union of two people, weddings can be a lot of fun too. The earliest meaning of wedding was simply 'the state of being married,' but by the early 1400s it meant the ceremony or rite at the very beginning of a marriage.

name: Birthday Parties
short_description: A birthday celebration is occasion for joy.
description: A birthday celebration is occasion for joy, laughter, and connection, and the perfect birthday party invitation kicks all of this off in style. Whether itâ€™s a milestone birthday, a themed or surprise party, or a simple, intimate gathering, crafting the right birthday invitation wording is essential to make your guests feel excited and eager to attend.

name: Anniversaries Parti
short_description: An anniversary is a date which is remembered.
description: An anniversary is a date which is remembered or celebrated because a special event happened on that date in a previous year.

name: Engagement Parties
short_description: Engagement parties are a great way to introduce both sides of the family.
description: Engagement parties are a great way to introduce both sides of the family as well as different friendship groups. Everyone gets to mingle which means your wedding is likely to be much more fun and relaxed.

name: Retirement Parties
short_description: A retirement party is a great way to honor your legacy.
description: If you or someone you know is retiring, there's cause for celebration. After years of hard work and dedication, a retirement party is a great way to honor your legacy, success, and accomplishments throughout the years.

name: Baby shower
short_description: A baby shower is a party centered on gift-giving to celebrate the delivery.
description: A baby shower is a party centered on gift-giving to celebrate the delivery or expected birth of a child, and the transformation of a woman into a mother.
